Ericsson | Java/JEE, C++, Python, Scrum Master, Architect, Cloud Engineers | Athlone, Ireland | Full-time | Onsite | Visa (Relocation package) | https://www.ericsson.com

We build the next generation of network management, analytics and orchestration solutions for operators around the world. We're one of (if not the) largest software development sites in Ireland. See more about our campus here: https://www.ericsson.com/careers/blog/career-topics/life-at-...

We're currently working on Cloud orchestration in 5G, going live with trials and helping our customers in the race to the connected society.

You can see all the positions here: https://jobs.ericsson.com/jobs?page=1&location=Athlone

We also have an Open Source role(s): https://jobs.ericsson.com/jobs/257494 which is probably somewhat unique for tech companies in Ireland!
